select s.id, u.id as user, s.shift, s.date_schedule, s.break_ex, s.break_force, concat(u.lastname, ' ', u.firstname) AS name_user from user u left join schedule s ON (u.id = s.user and s.date_schedule >= #{date_from} and s.date_schedule < #{date_to}) where u.id = #{userid} order by u.lastname asc

select s.id, u.id as user, s.shift, s.date_schedule, s.break_ex, s.break_force, concat(u.lastname, ' ', u.firstname) AS name_user from user u left join schedule s ON (u.id = s.user and s.date_schedule >= #{date_from} and s.date_schedule < #{date_to}) where u.status = 'IN ORGANICO' and u.out_schedule = 0
